alert.note: Alert for Morehouse (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:18PM CST until December 09 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CST FOR CENTRAL MOREHOUSE PARISH... At 518 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Swartz, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bastrop, Collinston, and Oak Ridge around 525 PM CST. Mer Rouge around 530 PM CST. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for northeastern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
